description:
First, the infamous hot springs episode! Onsokumaru is foaming at the mouth for a chance to see some skin! Unfortunately, Miyabi`s stationed her magical guardians in a defensive perimeter around the women`s bathing area. But where there is a ninja will...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I. Garotas Ficando Quentes! / II. Kaede Pega Um Resfriado!
Les filles ont chaud / Kaede est malade
Onnanoko, Attamaru no Maki / Kaede, Kaze o Hiku no Maki
The Girls Get Warm / Kaede Gets Sick
女の子, あったまるの巻 / 楓, 風邪を引くの巻
